title: Astria - Finetune Stable Diffusion
keywords: AI, stable-diffusion, stable diffusion, GAN, generative images, Dreambooth API,
introduction: Astria.ai is an AI model platform that offers fine-tuning for neural-network models to generate images, prompt generation for image sets, and video creation services. It provides high-quality fine-tuning without the need for managing GPUs or adjusting hyper-parameters. The platform also offers an easy API for quick integration.
features: Fine-tuning neural-network AI models for new concepts
Video creation at 24 frames per second
pricing: $1.50 per fine-tune, $0.10 per prompt, $0.40 per 100 frames in a video

faqs.question: What is fine-tuning?
faqs.answer: Fine-tuning is the process of training a neural-network AI model with a new concept to generate a 4GB new model file containing the knowledge of the new concept.

faqs.question: What are prompts used for?
faqs.answer: Prompts are texts used with the fine-tuned model to generate a set of images.

faqs.question: What is the frame rate for videos on Astria.ai?
faqs.answer: Videos on Astria.ai are created at 24 frames per second.
